What are the treatments for MYH7-related scapuloperoneal myopathy ?,How might scapuloperoneal myopathy be treated? There is no standard course of treatment for scapuloperoneal myopathy. Some patients may benefit from physical therapy or other therapeutic exercises.,GARD,MYH7-related scapuloperoneal myopathy
